name: SchoolDays
0:
”Alexa, ask n. y. c. schools, How many school days left?”
”Alexa, ask n. y. c. schools, When is the last day of school?”
”Alexa, ask n. y. c. schools, I hear those things are awfully loud.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. y. c. schools
des: A simple skill which determines how many school days are left in the New York City public school system school year.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
